titleStmt.title: An astrologicall judgement upon His Maiesties present martch begun from Oxford May 7. 1645. By Geo: Wharton.
titleStmt.author: Wharton, George, Sir, 1617-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by H. Hall for Will. Sheares,

notesStmt.note: Title surrounded by engraved arch with corinthian columns and ornamented pediment.
Another issue lacks "Will. Sheares" in imprint.
Caption title on p. 1: An astrologicall judgement upon His Majesties march.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
